channel.title: How to add ::yell color's to the client 317 delta
channel.description: i want to have colors for yell title's but i try'd @red@ or @yel@... but they wont work, does some one know how to add them to the client ?

item.title: How to add ::yell color's to the client 317 delta
item.dc:creator: @Ninjamovement Ninjamovement
item.description:
@Ninjamovement wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:2, topic:484548”]Delta doesn’t support this by default.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/338043-my-deltascape-tutorials.html[/quote]
thanks for helping me!

Read full topic
item.source: How to add ::yell color's to the client 317 delta
